trans-unit.source: T These event arguments contain information about the content fragment that is being navigated to, and are passed to handlers of the **FragmentNavigation** event, which is implemented by the following:
trans-unit.target: T estos argumentos de evento contienen información sobre el fragmento de contenido que se navega y se pasa a los controladores de la **FragmentNavigation** evento, que es implementado por el texto siguiente:

trans-unit.source: By default, a content fragment is content that is contained by a named <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, which is a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> whose <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> attribute is set, e.g.:
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, un fragmento de contenido es contenido incluido en un conjunto con nombre <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>, que es un <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> cuyo <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> atributo está establecido, p. ej.:

trans-unit.source: You navigate to a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragment by providing a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] with a suffix in the following format:
trans-unit.target: Navegue hasta una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-titlexaml-md.md)] fragmento proporcionando un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] con un sufijo en el formato siguiente:

trans-unit.source: The following shows an example of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that refers to a content fragment:
trans-unit.target: La siguiente muestra un ejemplo de un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] que hace referencia a un fragmento de contenido:

trans-unit.source: You can handle the **FragmentNavigation** event and use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs> to implement a custom content fragment handling implementation.
trans-unit.target: Puede controlar la **FragmentNavigation** evento y utilice <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs> para implementar un fragmento de contenido personalizado, control de implementación.

trans-unit.source: If you set the property to an empty string, the top of the content will be navigated to by default.
trans-unit.target: Si establece la propiedad en una cadena vacía, se navegará a la parte superior del contenido de forma predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the fragment navigation has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un valor que indica si se controló la navegación del fragmento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the navigation has been handled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si se controló la navegación; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs.Handled%2A> is set to `false`, the system attempts to find an element with the name of the fragment and bring it into view.
trans-unit.target: Si <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs.Handled%2A> se establece en `false`, el sistema intenta buscar un elemento con el nombre del fragmento y colocarlo en la vista.

trans-unit.source: When you handle the **FragmentNavigation** event and use <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs> to implement a custom content fragment handling implementation, you need to set <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs.Handled%2A> is set to `true` to override the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: Al controlar la **FragmentNavigation** evento y utilice <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs> para implementar un fragmento de contenido personalizado, control de implementación, es necesario establecer <xref:System.Windows.Navigation.FragmentNavigationEventArgs.Handled%2A> está establecido en `true` para invalidar el comportamiento predeterminado.

trans-unit.source: The navigator that raised the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationService.FragmentNavigation" /> event.

A <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that refers to the navigator ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />.) that is navigating to the content fragment.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que hace referencia al navegador ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_iegeneric](~/includes/tla2sharptla-iegeneric-md.md)], <see cref="T:System.Windows.Navigation.NavigationWindow" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Frame" />.) que navega al fragmento de contenido.
